entitlements.name: The Lord of the Rings: Aragorn's Quest

name: The Lord of the Rings: Aragorn's Quest
short_name: The Lord of the Rings: Aragorn's Quest
long_desc:
Become the legendary Aragorn as you embark upon a single player quest reliving the hero's most valiant battles from The Lord of the Rings trilogy. Through exciting, action-packed combat work to defend Middle-earth against Sauron's evil forces using your mighty sword. Along the way, you can upgrade Aragorn's weapons, armor and combat skills to fit your individual fighting style.

PRODUCT FEATURES:
• Play Through the Most Exciting Parts of The Lord of the Rings Movies: Embark upon a single player campaign that follows the story of Aragorn, spanning The Lord of the Rings trilogy.
• Intuitive, Pick-Up-and-Play Combat System: Experience skirmishes that are satisfying and fun for the casual gamer, but with customizable upgrades and abilities that appeals to more sophisticated players.
• Upgradeable Combat: Customize Aragorn to suit your battle style by unlocking abilities and upgrading armor as the character levels up and develops.
